definition: pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: She's a real foodie, she likes seafood, pasta, dessert and so on.
sentences.chinese: 她是个十足的吃货，她喜欢海鲜，意面，甜品等等。

sentences.english: Put in a large bowl and toss with the butter and olive oil.
sentences.chinese: 把意面放在大碗里，加入橄榄油和黄油搅拌。

sentences.english: Baked white asparagus pasta with egg cream, tagliatelle with poppy seeds and prosciutto.
sentences.chinese: 烘焙白芦笋意面配蛋蜜乳，罂粟籽火腿意式扁面。

sentences.english: Add in pasta, arugula, salt and pepper, toss gently and transfer to serving plates.
sentences.chinese: 放入意面，芝麻菜，加盐和黑椒，兜匀后上碟。

sentences.english: Spaghetti and Meatballs is his absolute favorite meal.
sentences.chinese: 意面和肉丸是他的最爱。

sentences.english: Serve over some pasta and sprinkle with cheese.
sentences.chinese: 和意面一起上桌，上面可以点缀些奶酪。

sentences.english: When the pasta is cooked, drain and return to pan. Add basil and toss together.
sentences.chinese: 意面煮好后，滤干水份放入酱汁内，加入罗勒叶兜匀。

sentences.english: There is something so cozy about spaghetti and meatballs.
sentences.chinese: 意面和肉丸是休闲的象征。

sentences.english: Ideal with salads, meat, pasta and pizza.
sentences.chinese: 是色拉，肉食，意面和比萨饼的理想配酒。

sentences.english: When the broth comes to a boil, add the uncooked pasta and stir everything together.
sentences.chinese: 开锅以后，把生的意面倒进去，一起搅一搅。

sentences.english: Bring a large pot of salted water to the boil and cook the spaghetti lunghi according to the packet.
sentences.chinese: 烧开一大锅盐水，放入意面按照包装要求煮好意面。

definition: rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
